name: Drango
description: BACKTRACK presents: Music from the soundtrack of the United Artists’ production of: DRANGO by Elmer Bernstein Limited Edition of 1,500 copies. Catalogue No. SEPIA 6000. Tracklisting 1. PRELUDE (Drango Comes to Kennesaw Pass) 3:34 2. THE HANGING 1:46 3. THE SEARCH 4:37 4. KATY 2:10 5. THE GATHERING STORM 3:35 6. THE PLOTTERS FAIL 6:01 7. THE CHILDREN’S GIFT 3:32 8. RANSOM HOUSE WALTZES 3:25 9. NEWS FROM DALTON 2:22 10. DRANGO AND KATY 2:25 11. DRANGO’S CHANCE 4:14 12. LOVE AND JUSTICE 4:42 About this release While every effort has been made to eliminate the surface noise from the original recordings used for this issue, including use of the CEDAR audio noise reduction system, some slight surface noise may remain. About Us Backtrack is one of Europe’s leading film music retailers. name: Trapeze/The Greatest Show On Earth
description: BACKTRACK presents: Music from the Soundtrack of the HECHT-LANCASTER production of TRAPEZE. Orchestra under the Direction of MUIR MATHIESON. Music by MALCOLM ARNOLD. Plus, THE GREATEST SHOW ON EARTH. Featuring the PARAMOUNT STUDIO BAND under the Direction of IRVIN TALBOT. Limited Edition of 1,500 copies. Catalogue No. SEPIA 6001. Tracklisting 1. PRELUDE 2. LOLA’S THEME 3. FANFARE AND ELEPHANT’S WALTZ 4. MIKE AND LOLA’S LOVE THEME 5. TRAPEZE (P. Elie) 6. WASHINGTON POST MARCH (SOUSA) 7. ENTRY OF THE GLADIATORS (Fucik) 8. JUKE BOX 9. TINO’S ARRIVAL IN PARIS 10. BLUE DANUBE (J. Strauss) Arr: M. Arnold 11. ABOVE THE RING 12. STARS AND STRIPES FOREVER (Sousa) 13. THE GREATEST SHOW ON EARTH (Washington-Young) 14. ONLY A ROSE (Hooker-Frim) 15. LOVELY LUAWANA LADY (North-Goetz) 16. BE A JUMPING JACK (Washington-Young) 17. POPCORN AND LEMONADE (Sullivan-Anderson) 18. A PICNIC IN THE PARK / SING A HAPPY SONG (Sullivan-Anderson) 19. DREAM LOVER (GREY-SCHERTZINGER) 20. STAND BY MARCH (L.S. Castellucci) About this release While every effort has been made to eliminate the surface noise from the original recordings used for this issue, including use of the CEDAR audio noise reduction system, some slight surface noise may remain.
